scripts.test: RUST_LOG=debug TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=debug TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" TRYORAMA_ZOME_CALL_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 TRYORAMA_CONDUCTOR_TIMEOUT_MS=100000 ts-node index.ts
scripts.build-test: cd ../../ && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm test
